name: Street Fighter (campotech)
description:
Street Fighter!!! The arcade classic comes to X-Station!!!

Street Fighter is a classic arcade game made in MUGEN and the
first fighting game to be release on X-Station. In this version
players choose from 10 different characters or 2 players can face
each other in a fighting contest. This game features 10 playable
characters each with their own stage and music. The game can be
played with a keyboard or a joystick (recommended)
